title: NHS Strategic Clinical Networks Ranking
description: By attributing a subjective score to the waiting times in getting a referral, the model ranks the performance of NHS Clinical Networks accordingly.

title: Energy Efficiency Support
description: A tool to filter and locate Waltham Forest properties in need of energy efficiency interventions and also quantify their costs and benefits.

title: Census 2021 Dashboard
description: Explore the demographics of Waltham Forest, analyse custom cross-sections of the population by taking advantage of the new multivariate ONS datasets.

title: Risk Assurance Dashboard
description: Displaying the Risk Assurance of an organisation through colour-coded bars based on a simple and fully customisabile model.

title: Natura Cycles Sales and Marketing Report
description: Sales and Marketing Dashboard for Natura, a Bicycle company. Industry landscape, market share, product volume, sales, and a tool for competitor analysis.

title: ONS Custom Area Profile Splitter
description: An R tool to split PNG chart mosaics produced with the Census 2021 Custom Area Profile Builder into individual chart tiles and make your own tile patterns.

title: FTSE 350 Audit Committee Members
description: A Python script that retrieves key information for all the Audit Committee members of the FTSE 350 companies at a given date.
